properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas; Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued March 2 at 10:42PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog will continue to develop over the bays, intracoastal
waterways, and over the nearshore coastal waters tonight through
Tuesday morning. Expect prevailing visibilities generally 2 to 3
miles. Patchy dense fog, with visibilities around 1 nautical mile
or less, may also develop.

Mariners over the bays, intracoastal waterways, and over the
nearshore coastal waters within 20 nautical miles offshore are
urged to prepare for rapidly changing visibilities.

NWSheadline: AREAS OF SEA FOG EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING OVER THE BAYS AND NEARSHORE COASTAL WATERS
